question: How do you check if your podman machine is running?
context: 0. Check if your podman machine is running or not by doing “wsl -l -v”. 1. If both podman machine and wsl-vpn-kit are stopped. Start podman machine by doing “podman machine start” Once machine is successfully started, you can start wsl-vpn-kit by doing “wsl.exe -d wsl-vpnkit -cd /app wsl-vpnkit” Keep the window or tab open, DO NOT CLOSE IT or stop the process. 1 2.
